comment._content: Maximilian Frances Schmittberger (July 27, 1851 - October 31, 1917), see en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_F._Schmittberger He was involved in the investigation of the bomb attack against the Italian Consulate, see comment under

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: B-59: Thank you for the information on Police Inspector Schmittberger  and his link to the investigation of the Italian Consulate bombing.  We will add more information about this to the description when we update.
